lead_paragraph: Five years after losing his legs in a crash, Alex Zanardi of Italy accomplished the last thing left on his comeback list: driving a Formula One car.On Saturday, the 40-year-old Zinardi became the first double amputee to test drive a Formula One car. Although engine failure caused the car to stall at the end of pit lane in the final session yesterday in Valencia, Spain, the point had been made.
